oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Modellierung betrieblicher C- und N-Flüsse als Grundlage einer Emissionsin-ventur
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Küstermann, Björn
Wenske, Karl
Hülsbergen, Kurt-Jürgen
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Air and water emissions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In organic farms, the internal carbon and nitrogen fluxes are of great importance. They are connected with the soil fertility (humus contents, biological activity, and soil struc-ture) and yield potential; some of them may affect the environment. The approach used in the described model software allows quantifying management related and siting dependant C and N fluxes and also the resulting emissions as starting point for an emission inventory from farms.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Küstermann, Björn; Wenske, Karl and Hülsbergen, Kurt-Jürgen (2007) Modellierung betrieblicher C- und N-Flüsse als Grundlage einer Emissionsin-ventur. [Modelling carbon and nitrogen fluxes for a farm based emission inventory.] Paper at: Zwischen Tradition und Globalisierung - 9. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Universität Hohenheim, Stuttgart, Deutschland, 20.-23.03.2007.
